title: Jennifer Garner goes shopping without her wedding ring
title_page: Jennifer Garner goes shopping without her wedding ring | Daily Mail Online
text:
It was reported earlier this week that she had called off her divorce with fellow actor Ben Affleck.
But Jennifer Garner added fuel to the rumour mill on Friday, as she headed out in California without her wedding ring.
The actress, 44, flaunted her enviably clear complexion as she went make-up free for her shopping trip in Brentwood - with her fourth finger still bare, amid claims she and Ben have reconciled.
Speculation: Jennifer Garner stepped out in California without her wedding ring on Friday - amid rumours she has called off her divorce from Ben Affleck
The 13 Going On 30 star kept things comfortable and casual for the outing in a knitted lilac jumper and black tracksuit bottoms.
Proving her natural beauty, the actress then simply swept her hair into a loose ponytail and kept her face bare, to show off her enviably smooth and clear skin.
However embarking on a phone call as she stepped out for her day, the mother-of-three then displayed her bare ring finger for all to see - despite claims she called off her engagement to estranged husband Ben.
Casually cool: The 13 Going On 30 star kept things comfortable and casual for the outing in a knitted lilac jumper and black tracksuit bottoms
Treat: The Dude Where's My Car star was then seen taking her children for lunch at their local Italian restaurant later that day
Glowing: Changing into jeans and sweeping her hair off her face with a pair of sunglasses, the star looked truly radiant as she picked up some delicious food for her and her family
The Dude Where's My Car star was then seen taking her children for lunch at their local Italian restaurant later that day.
Changing into jeans and sweeping her hair off her face with a pair of sunglasses, the star looked truly radiant as she picked up some delicious food for her and her family.
Her upbeat appearances follows claims that she and her husband Ben, with whom she shares Violet, 11, Seraphina, eight and five-year-old Samuel, have called off their divorce.
Love on the cards? Her upbeat appearances follows claims that she and her husband Ben have called off their divorce
Shopping time: Jennifer had kept it casual while shopping with her children Thursday in Los Angeles
Casual style: The actress wore a blue T-shirt and blue skinny jeans while out with son Samuel
Winning smile: Jennifer flashed her dimples while crossing an intersection with her son
The pair first formed a friendship on the sets of Pearl Harbour of Daredevil, and went on to marry in 2005.
Yet, the couple announced they were divorcing in June 2015 after 10 years of marriage, amid rumors Ben had cheated with a nanny.
However according to People, Jennifer has now decided to call of the divorce as the pair are in 'marriage-repair mode'.
Moving crew: A moving crew was spotted Wednesday at Jennifer's home in Los Angeles
Interesting reading: Violet carried a paperback book titled Raising Twins: From Pregnancy to Preschool
Family outing: Samuel and Violet accompanied Jennifer to a clothing store
She was set to move ahead with the divorce a month ago but their relationship made an abrupt turn.
'Jen has called off the divorce. She really wants to work things out with Ben. They are giving things another try,' a source close to Jennifer told the magazine.
A moving truck was spotted Wednesday at the family's Los Angeles home where Ben has continued to live since their split.
Store selection: The actress checked out items for sale at a Jill Roberts store
Athletic look: Jennifer wore sweatpants inside the store
Not letting their issues get in the way of their parenting, the acting duo have continued to raise their kids as normal over the last year - throwing their son Samuel a joint birthday party the day after the Oscars.
However the source added that the couple, who first became friends on the sets of Pearl Harbour and Daredevil, have worked hard to get to this civil point.
'Life with Ben has always been up and down for Jen,' another source told the magazine. 'Jen made it clear to Ben a while ago that she wants to have a life with three kids and one husband and not feel like she had four kids. It's exhausting having to worry about Ben constantly.'
